greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A082894(n)-A000079(n), that is difference of 2^n and the number closest to it and divisible by n.
comment: n=5:2^5=32 and number divisible by n=5 and closest to 32 is 30 = A082894(5), a(5)=30-32=-2 is the corresponding difference.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 22 2003
